page.title: 19LIVING IN THE SEISDON AREA
page.content: It is quite obvious that most of the people who live in this area do so from choice. They enjoy the country way of life and do not hanker after the bright lights of the town. For them the possible inconveniences of life in the country are far outweighed by the beauty and spaciousness of the country- side and the quieter pace of life. Many of them have fine gardens which bear witness to the owners' hard work and enthusiasm. For some there is great pride in their houses and a wonderful sense of continuity when they can say "my family has lived in this house for generations".
